verses.name: Psalms 43:1
verses.text: Judge me, O God, and plead my cause against an ungodly nation: O deliver me from the deceitful and unjust man.

verses.name: Psalms 43:2
verses.text: For thou art the God of my strength: why dost thou cast me off? why go I mourning because of the oppression of the enemy?

verses.name: Psalms 43:3
verses.text: O send out thy light and thy truth: let them lead me; let them bring me unto thy holy hill, and to thy tabernacles.

verses.name: Psalms 43:4
verses.text: Then will I go unto the altar of God, unto God my exceeding joy: yea, upon the harp will I praise thee, O God my God.
